OpenSim::MarkerFrame

MarkerFrame Class Reference

#include <MarkerFrame.h>

Inheritance diagram for MarkerFrame:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A class implementing a frame of marker data from a TRC/TRB file.

Author:
Peter Loan
Version:
1.0
